name: COUNTY OF ALLEGHENY, Appellant, v. ALLEGHENY COUNTY POLICE ASSOCIATION and Thomas Boyle, Trustee Ad Litem
name_abbreviation: County of Allegheny v. Allegheny County Police Ass'n

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, zappala and papadakos, jj.
HUTCHINSON, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: COUNTY OF ALLEGHENY, Appellant, v. ALLEGHENY COUNTY POLICE ASSOCIATION and Thomas Boyle, Trustee Ad Litem.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
HUTCHINSON, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
ZAPPALA, J., dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: James J. Dodaro, County Sol., Thomas H.M. Hough, Asst. County Sol., Pittsburgh, for appellant.
Ronald P. Koerner, Gatz, Cohen, Segal & Koerner, Pittsburgh, James L. Weisman, Weisman & Pass, Pittsburgh, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
531 A.2d 1108
COUNTY OF ALLEGHENY, Appellant, v. ALLEGHENY COUNTY POLICE ASSOCIATION and Thomas Boyle, Trustee Ad Litem.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 24, 1987.
Decided Oct. 8, 1987.
James J. Dodaro, County Sol., Thomas H.M. Hough, Asst. County Sol., Pittsburgh, for appellant.
Ronald P. Koerner, Gatz, Cohen, Segal & Koerner, Pittsburgh, James L. Weisman, Weisman & Pass, Pittsburgh, for appellees.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, zappala and papadakos, jj.
